ovdesc.p: This application is used to maintain the status of the external records. If no action is taken then the status is set to 'UNMAPPED', if the records are used to update the internal data base or transmitted to external data base then the status is changed to either 'MAPPED', if the operation was successful or to 'ERROR' if the operation was a failure. The detail error message will also be maintained by the application.

desc.p: Alpha-numeric record key of up to 50 characters in length.
Holds the detail error messages. Updated by external process.

Defines the status of the external record: UNMAPPED- Record is yet to be processed MAPPED - Record is successfully mapped into the system REMAP - The operation is to be reperformed DELETE - The external record is to be deleted
Only the above stated values are allowed. Out of these values, UNAMPPED & MAPPED are set by the system. User has the option of inputting either REMAP or DELETE.
A maximum of 50 characters may be entered.
